extendedInfo.description: Use your fingers to build wood bridges and let the vehicles cross them. Use as less material as you can to get the highest score. This free version includes 8 stages.Solutions available at: http://www.edbasoftware.com*** Change Log ***1.0.0 - Initial version: 4 stages1.0.1 - Bug fixes (vehicles and highscores)1.1.0 - New stages: 6 stages1.2.0 - New Stages: 8 stages1.2.1 - Missing vehicles bugfix1.2.2 - Sound bugfix1.3.0 - Menu improvements; smaller APK installer1.3.1 - Global highscores bugfix1.3.2 - Level 21 name change1.3.3 - Vehicles can now spin more than 360 degrees1.4.0 - Improvements1.5.0 - Freeze by phone calls/SMSs bugfix1.5.1 - Global scores bugfix1.5.2 - Back button functionality fix1.6.0 - Small improvements1.6.1 - Toggle buttons; "play next" menu; APP2SD; new help1.6.2 - "Vehicle has broken" message1.6.3 - 1 new stages : 9 stages now1.7.0 - Scores bugfix

reviews.title: Ok i guess
reviews.comment: It only had 8 levels n u only got steal bars at the last one it would be good if it was a demo not a free version cus free things have other levels then the payed one n a demo has a few levels from the payed one..is good but i finish in a hour n a half uninstalling thank u have a good one:-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s okay but not as good as others
reviews.comment: It\'s okay, pretty good but not as good as others. There is no stress for starters but the crossing ideas are more fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty fun game, but physics need a lot of work. Like A LOT of work:-)  Otherwise its worth trying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks bad
reviews.comment: I have a Samsung galaxy s3 which is a very new phone... this game crashes, won\'t delete and overall sucks bad.. wouldn\'t waste my time on downloading it. If I could rate 0.01 stars I would. I have to glove credit for trying to make a good app but.. it\'s free and doesn\'t even give 2 mins of gameplay before shutting down my phone completely. Either fix or remake. Cheers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Its not very good, the game needs ALOT of work.
reviews.author: Emma Allen

reviews.title: wood bridges awesome
reviews.comment: great game i enjoyed alot n waiting for full version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good controls, flawed game.
reviews.comment: Physics less sophisticated than other bridge games I\'ve played and it caused my phone to crash. This is a shame since the controls are far above average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unhappy.
reviews.comment: This game sucks to me, the bridges are always unstable and the distances you have to build are impossible. I got stuck on one level and I can\'t get past it because the distance is very far, and I didn\'t have anything for supporting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok game horrible controls
reviews.comment: Any slight Swype takes you to main menu
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good game ..
reviews.comment: sucks that after the tenth bridge you must buy it .. welp uninstalling ! :)

reviews.comment: It was good but I only used it once and then it didn\'t work after woods
